sources.title: SouthState Data Breach Investigation - Strauss Borrelli PLLC
sources.snippet: On February 6, 2024, SouthState Corporation reported the cybersecurity incident in its Form 8-K filing with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission. queries.rationale: Investigate any recent fines or penalties imposed by regulatory bodies
Look for patterns of customer dissatisfaction or unethical practices
Assess the impact of any known data breaches or cyberattacks on the company
